channel.title: Bo2 ps3
channel.description: Add SeifBird if you want to go play BO2 MP/Zombies. :) I also have a PVR if you need anything recorded

item.title: Bo2 ps3
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

ytuio9`:

I bought BO2 2 weeks ago and never played multiplayer. I played through the campaign for a few hours then I got bored and turned my PS3 off.

I’ve played every single CoD game, but the only one I actual played the campaign on was CoD 4. This was because I didn’t get internet at my house until after I beat the CoD 4 campaign. It’s a very unique game, but it really is only made for the online game-play, or at least how most of the players see it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Your post has not made me value your opinion any more or any less because it’s just as stupid as usual. If your reply is not going to hold any value I will not respond to it to avoid unnecessary infractions + wastage of time.
